des: "Picked up a bottle of lychee liqueur over the weekend and put together this easy drink recipe.  It's so yummy, even my beer drinking husband had a couple of these!  Try other cranberry juice combinations (i.e. cran-raspberry) for a nice variation."
ins: Fill a Collins glass with ice.  Pour in lychee liqueur, vodka, and cranberry juice.  Stir with a straw and enjoy.
